description: Pharmacokinetic properties including absorption, distribution, metabolism, and excretion (ADME).
prompt_text:
Write the Pharmacokinetics section for {{compoundName}} Investigator's Brochure.

You are writing about the ACTUAL drug {{compoundName}}, not a template. Use real PK data from FDA label, clinical pharmacology studies, and literature.

Format in Markdown with ## headings, tables, and bullet points.

Cover:

## Absorption
Bioavailability, Tmax, Cmax, food effect

## Distribution  
Vd, protein binding, tissue distribution

## Metabolism
CYP enzymes, metabolites, pathways

## Excretion
Half-life, clearance, routes

## Special Populations
Renal/hepatic impairment, elderly, pediatric

## Drug-Drug Interactions
CYP interactions, clinically significant DDIs

Include specific values with units. Write 8-12 pages for {{compoundName}}.
